attributes.action: not to consider "downgrading" Christmas and therfore other Christian celebrations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country has been a Christian country for hundreds of years. The recomendations by a think tank to downgrade Christian celebrations in line with those of other cultures are contrary to this country's history and culture. This country prides itself on tolerance and acceptance, whilst still keeping our identity. This petition is to enable our rights to be kept.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
